extendedIngredients.name: sun dried tomato
extendedIngredients.original: 3 Tbsp. KRAFT Sun Dried Tomato Vinaigrette Dressing
extendedIngredients.originalName: KRAFT Sun Dried Tomato Vinaigrette Dressing

title: Mediterranean Tuna
summary: Mediterranean Tunan is a dairy free and pescatarian recipe with 5 servings. One serving contains 98 calories, 11g of protein, and 4g of fat. For 56 cents per serving, this recipe covers 8% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Head to the store and pick up tuna, pimento-stuffed olives, sun tomato vinaigrette dressing, and a few other things to make it today. 1 person found this recipe to be delicious and satisfying. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 3 hours and 5 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 43%, this dish is pretty good. Similar recipes are Health Benefits of Tuna: Mediterranean Tunan Antipasto Salad, Mediterranean Tuna Salad, and Mediterranean Tuna Salad.

winePairing.pairingText: Tuna works really well with Merlot, Pinot Noir, and rosé Wine. Though fish is often paired with white wine, 'meatier' fish like tuna can absolutely go with red wine. A Rosé will also pair nicely, particularly if your tunan is prepared with ingredients better suited to a white wine. You could try Nickel & Nickel Harris Vineyard Merlot. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.2 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 40 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Nickel & Nickel Harris Vineyard Merlot
productMatches.description: Bright red fruits, candied blueberry, Santa Rosa plum and menthol aromas all blend together to intoxicate the nose as the 2016 Harris Vineyard Merlot wafts from the glass. On the palate, a juicy and fruity entry is supported by chewy tannins and a balancing acidity, creating lush layers that coat the tongue and produce a soft, elegant finish.

instructions: Mix tuna, olives and dressing until well blended; cover.                                              Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.                                              Serve with the crackers.

steps.step: Mix tuna, olives and dressing until well blended; cover.
Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.
